title: Shame, shame, shame.
body:
Watch the H2K vs ANX match and there is so much BM - particularly from H2K, throwing up every time they get a kill.

Let's face it. Both teams are crap and should learn to be a bit humbler. H2K now run into a Korean team and their exit from Worlds is assured. I guarantee there will be no such BM from the Korean team while they just shit on H2K.

Just a bunch of bads beating worse and thinking they're good. Shame!
